description: This file provides dependency injection for a FastAPI application, specifically supplying a notes repository implementation. It currently offers an in-memory repository and is designed to support switching implementations in the future.

classes.name: InMemoryNotesRepository
classes.description: An in-memory implementation of the NotesRepository interface, providing storage for notes within the application's memory.

classes.name: NotesRepository
classes.description: Abstract base or interface specifying the contract for notes repository implementations.

methods.name: Generator[NotesRepository,None,None] get_notes_repository()
methods.description: A generator function that provides a NotesRepository implementation for route handlers, allowing dependency injection.
